name: Ikejime
description:
IKEJIME

One day, a fish-lover inherits the family business.. Fish mongering!!! 

Please send these poor fishes off to heaven quickly.

Press Spacebar to send them off in one strike. Hit multiple fishes in one line for more sales.  Remember to aim for their heads.

(Ikejime (活け締め) or Ikijime (活き締め) is a humane method of killing fish to maintain the quality of its meat)

Music: Evan King - [Dingos]https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCT1ZkP03V18LmOj8zbyP-Dw?

Made with a lot of help from DY, my sanity and 7 days worth of tears ...
